reviews.text: Relax Lounge is my favorite restaurant in the area, the atmosphere is very inviting. The owners are very nice and they make you feel like family. Delicious food and drinks üçπ We order Bolognese pasta, it was al dente just as i wanted, fresh and it tasted really good üòä  Definitely will come back !
Carbonara is too salty. Food took 30 minutes for overcooked pasta
Came here today for the first time, the chicken Caesar salad was delicious as was the white wine. The ambiance is lovely as is the staff
Mediocre. No diaper changer with a lot of families there. Weird vibe when I walked in. Was asked what I wanted with no menu.

GREAT FOOD!, unfortunately we had to just take our food out due to the smoke inside of the business, i do not recommend this place for families who wants to have a nice dinner, the door is always open and leaves all the smoke of the people smoking outside get in, they have a really nice bar, and an outside seating space which seem really nice as long as you want to smoke and drink, not coming back for food even thought it was amazing food, if you make a restaurant make sure your guest don‚Äôt have smoke all over their faces it was really unsanitary and unprofessional.

My fiance always comes here. I went to use the bathroom and couldn‚Äôt find the guy that worked there to ask. I was going to grab a cappucino. Mid washing my hands I get an aggressive knock on the door. I go outside to look for my partner to go buy a coffee and the guy follows me outside and reprimands me saying it‚Äôs weird to just go use the bathroom. Not only did he go out of his way to harass me while using the bathroom but to reprimand me and follow me outside. My partner is a regular and now we are never going back. He‚Äôs the guy who works on Saturday afternoons. First time ever writing a review because I‚Äôve never had a guy go out of his way to give me a hard time for using the bathroom. Meanwhile all men hanging and made it really uncomfortable and made me feel really uncomfortable and attacked and turned me off from buying based on his assumption. Terrible service.
they got rats and the food is trashhh
Loud and ugly

3 of my coworkers and I visited Relax bar on friday 8/2/24. We were all AMAZED AT The great service. Given the establishment was empty because it was 2:45pm on a friday. We had the restaurant to ourselves it was great. Its a small cozy place both indoor and outdoor dining. What we loved was the attention our server gave us. She served our drinks and made them nicely. We ordered a bunch of appetizers and shared them. They were all so delicious. I dont think I can say I had a favorite because they were all SO DELICIOUS‚Ä¶ The chef definitely Outdid himself. The Food was HOT AND FRESH.  The dessert was also amazing. Thanks for the great visit. We will definitely be back.

If you drive:
The Ridgewood area is congested. Always busy.
No parking only street parking if your lucky.

We ordered Two margaritas they were awful she used the concentrated lime juice that you find in the supermarket to make it. No margaritas mix no nothing and definitely no sugar and whatever tequila she used it tasted like gasoline. Maybe that‚Äôs why everyone was having beers when I walked in

We had the amazing lamb chops today.  The staff is very friendly and sweet.  The drinks are fabulous.  My Mother had the Negroni and I had Tequila.  The pistachio dessert was fabulous.

I just love this spot. A peace of home or European vibe that we miss so much in Ridgewood ( unlike Astoria). Food improved greatly ( they had some failures in the past). All in all great spot to relax a bit in rush day.

Great place! The bruschetta was out of this world, the calamari crispy and tasty, and they actually have good espresso -- which, weirdly enough, is hard to find. 10/10!

Don't order take out from this place. I was informed BY THE DELIVERY DRIVER, not the restaurant, that when he went to retrieve the food, my order had been canceled. He said they told him the computers were not working. So why list your place on a delivery app? How was the driver notified to come get a delivery? Im so confused. Then when I tried to contact the place, it suddenly was listed as ‚Äúclosed‚Äù. This is beyond unprofessional. I had to contact the app customer service for a refund. I was never contacted by the business itself nor could I contact them. Do better‚Ä¶

People friendly. Tasty food. Great prices. And very relaxed atmosphere.

Amazing service , food is top notch especially the prosciutto platter with olives and mozzarella balls. Served on a beautiful wooden tree trunk platter. Music, and great atmosphere. Its definitely a regular spot for me. Love this place. Gorgeous inside and out!

Very nice place, delicious food and good cocktails . The service was 10/10 and the decorations and environment were typical European which we all loved cause you can‚Äôt find that easily in NYC. Definitely going back there to enjoy other dishes.

This new place is beautiful inside and out! The food was fantastic (big portions), and the passion of the very sweet owners was outstanding. They gave us a nice tour of the place, which has a large back room and outdoor seating!

This place is amazing! Went here on a Tuesday night and the owner was so gracious and showed us the restaurant. This place is truly a gem within Ridgewood that everyone must experience. I will definitively be coming here again. The food is amazing and fresh, the service was fantastic and the overall atmosphere was relaxing!!

It was an incredible experience, friendly service, cozy atmosphere and delicious dishes, well served and reasonably priced. They serve Mediterranean food with excellent options on the menu. I missed a wine menu. It's on my list of the best restaurants in New York and close to home.

Nice place! I sat here a few hours with my laptop getting work done. The coffee was great. The lunch was great. The staff was very friendly and helpful. Will definitely be back.
